column2: BRIEF-Cooper Companies Reports Q2 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.23 June 4 (Reuters) - Cooper Companies Inc: * Q2 REVENUE $524.9 MILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $591.6 MILLION * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $2.29 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * NO LONGER PROVIDING FISCAL YEAR 2020 GUIDANCE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Coopercompanies Announces $2.14 Billion Senior Credit Facility April 1 (Reuters) - Cooper Companies Inc: * COOPERCOMPANIES ANNOUNCES $2.14 BILLION SENIOR CREDIT FACILITY AND AMENDMENT OF $500 MILLION 364-DAY CREDIT FACILITY * COOPER COMPANIES INC - AMENDMENT TO ITS $500 MILLION 364-DAY CREDIT FACILITY * COOPER COMPANIES INC - FACILITY EXTENDS OUR MATURITY DATES, REDUCES PRICING AND PROVIDES ADDITIONAL AVAILABILITY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-The Cooper Companies Announces Executive Management Changes May 23 (Reuters) - Cooper Companies Inc: * THE COOPER COMPANIES ANNOUNCES EXECUTIVE MANAGEMENT CHANGES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Generation Investment Management Reports 5.2 Pct Passive Stake In Cooper Companies As Of April 16 April 26 (Reuters) - Cooper Companies Inc: * GENERATION INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT LLP REPORTS 5.2 PERCENT PASSIVE STAKE IN COOPER COMPANIES INC AS OF APRIL 16 - SEC FILING Source text: [bit.ly/2r1cVFr] Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Brian Andrews To Succeed Albert White As CFO Of Cooper Companies April 23 (Reuters) - Cooper Companies Inc: * BRIAN ANDREWS TO SUCCEED ALBERT WHITE AS CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER OF THE COOPER COMPANIES * COOPER COMPANIES INC - ANDREWS WILL SUCCEED ALBERT WHITE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
